definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: Hand hooping with a hula hoop is fun because of the large number of possibilities for variety in tricks.
sentences.chinese: 手用呼拉圈套箍，是因爲各種可能性大批過關樂趣。

sentences.english: Many records have been set by people who love to hula hoop.
sentences.chinese: 熱愛搖呼拉圈的人創下了許多紀錄。

sentences.english: Then adults started using them for calisthenics.
sentences.chinese: 接着，成年人也開始用呼拉圈來鍛鍊身體。

sentences.english: Grandma can shake the hula hoop for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶可以搖呼拉圈搖很久。

sentences.english: Today, frames are as outdated as hula hoops.
sentences.chinese: 如今，那些框架就像呼拉圈一樣過時了。

sentences.english: Aerobics were more fun, including hula hooping.
sentences.chinese: 有氧運動更加有趣，呼拉圈是其中的一個項目。

sentences.english: Glowing hula hoop meets Javanese Gamelan.
sentences.chinese: 當熒光呼拉圈遭遇爪哇加麥蘭。

sentences.english: Remember the hula hoop from childhood?
This means that a person was given official credit for inventing the hula hoop.
sentences.chinese: 這表示某人獲得了發明呼拉圈的官方認證。

sentences.english: The most twirled at once was 107 hula hoops.
sentences.chinese: 而同時用最多呼拉圈搖的紀錄則是107個。

sentences.english: Almost everyone has used a hula hoop at least once in their lives.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎每個人一生中都至少玩過一次呼拉圈。

sentences.english: The longest anyone has ever twirled one was 90 hours.
sentences.chinese: 搖呼拉圈搖最久的是90個小時。

sentences.english: Today in 1963, the hula hoop was patented.
sentences.chinese: 在1963年的今天，呼拉圈被申請專利。

sentences.english: To protect himself he persuaded French celebrities to be photographed hooping.
sentences.chinese: 現在爲了自衛，他設法讓法國名流都戴上呼拉圈拍照。

sentences.english: Mass wiggle earns German city a new hula hoop record.
sentences.chinese: 德國城市創下集體轉呼拉圈世界紀錄。

definition: pole-climbing (as gymnastics or circus act)/climbing pole
